name: jest-unit-tests

scripts.test:sealights:js: npm run build && jest --config jest.config.js.js --sl-testStage='JavaScript Tests' --sl-tokenfile=sltoken.txt --sl-buildsessionidfile=buildSessionId

author: Kristijan Stefanoski<k.stefanoski@ext.tricentis.com>
description: A simple unit testing example with Jest and Sealights implementation using the Jest plugin
